com.geom.model

Class Figure

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geom.model.Figure
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConvexQuadrilateral, EmptyFigure, Line, Polygon, Punct, RegularPolygon

    public class Figure
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the most basic shapes, without any condition regarding number of points, lengths.
    Author:
    Dasha

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D> points
      A geometric is here defined by a list of points.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Figure()
      Class that instantiates a new figure without any provided set of points.
      Figure(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D> points)
      Overloading the first constructor, to accept the instantiation of a figure with a list of points.
